00035 template<typename Point>
00036 long int BinarySearch(std::vector<Point *> &A, Point *q, zorder_lt<Point> lt) 
00037 {
00038         long int low = 0;
00039         long int high = A.size()-1;
00040         long int middle;
00041 
00042         while(low <= high)
00043         {
00044           middle = (low+high)/2;
00045           if(q == A[middle])
00046             return middle;
00047           else if(lt(q, A[middle]))
00048             high = middle-1;
00049           else
00050             low = middle+1;
00051         }
00052         return middle;
00053 }

00055 template<typename Point>
00056 unsigned long int BinSearch(std::vector<Point> &A, Point &q, zorder_lt<Point> &lt)
00057 {
00058   typedef typename std::vector<Point>::iterator MyIt;
00059   typedef typename std::vector<Point>::size_type size_type;
00060 
00061   MyIt I = upper_bound(A.begin(), A.end(), q, lt);
00062 
00063   return I - A.begin();
00064 }

00076 template<typename Point>
00077 void PairBinarySearch(std::vector<Point> &A, Point q1, 
00078                       Point q2, zorder_lt<Point> lt, int &p1, int &p2) 
00079 {
00080   int low_q1=0;
00081   int low_q2=0;
00082   int high_q1 = A.size()-1;
00083   int high_q2 = A.size()-1;
00084   int middle = 0;
00085   int middle_store;
00086   
00087   p1 = -2;
00088   p2 = -2;
00089   
00090   while((low_q1 == low_q2) && (high_q1 == high_q2) && (p1 == -2) && (p2 == -2))
00091     {
00092       middle = (low_q1+high_q1)/2;
00093       if(q1 == A[middle])
00094         p1 = middle;
00095       else if(lt(q1, A[middle]))
00096         high_q1 = middle-1;
00097       else
00098         low_q1 = middle+1;
00099       if(q2 == A[middle])
00100         p2 = middle;
00101       else if(lt(q2, A[middle]))
00102         high_q2 = middle-1;
00103       else
00104         low_q2 = middle+1;
00105     }
00106   middle_store = middle;
00107   while(low_q1 <= high_q1)
00108     {
00109       middle = (low_q1+high_q1)/2;
00110       if(q1 == A[middle])
00111         break;
00112       else if(lt(q1, A[middle]))
00113         high_q1 = middle-1;
00114       else
00115         low_q1 = middle+1;
00116     }
00117   p1 = middle;
00118   middle = middle_store;
00119   while(low_q2 <= high_q2)
00120     {
00121       middle = (low_q2+high_q2)/2;
00122       if(q2 == A[middle])
00123         break;
00124       else if(lt(q2, A[middle]))
00125         high_q2 = middle-1;
00126       else
00127         low_q2 = middle+1;
00128     }
00129   p2 = middle;
00130 }  
00131 
00133 /*
00134   This function executes a binary search on a vector of points
00135   \param A Vector of points to search
00136   \param q Query point
00137   \param lt A less_than comparetor
00138   \return If found: index of point. Otherwise: index of first smaller point
00139 */
00140 template<typename Point>
00141 long int BinarySearch(std::vector<Point> &A, Point q, zorder_lt<Point> lt) 
00142 {
00143         long int low = 0;
00144         long int high = A.size()-1;
00145         long int middle = 0;
00146 
00147         while(low <= high)
00148         {
00149                 middle = (low+high)/2;
00150                 if(q == A[middle])
00151                         return middle;
00152                 else if(lt(q, A[middle]))
00153                         high = middle-1;
00154                 else
00155                         low = middle+1;
00156         }
00157         return middle;
00158 }
00159 
00161 /*
00162   This function executes a binary search on an array of points
00163   \param A pointer to head of array
00164   \param size size of array
00165   \param q Query point
00166   \param lt A less_than comparetor
00167   \return If found: index of point. Otherwise: index of first smaller point
00168 */
00169 template<typename Point>
00170 long int BinarySearch(Point *A, long int size, Point q, zorder_lt<Point> lt) 
00171 {
00172         long int low = 0;
00173         long int high = size-1;
00174         long int middle = 0;
00175 
00176         while(low <= high)
00177         {
00178                 middle = (low+high)/2;
00179                 if(q == A[middle])
00180                         return middle;
00181                 else if(lt(q, A[middle]))
00182                         high = middle-1;
00183                 else
00184                         low = middle+1;
00185         }
00186         return middle;
00187 }

00189 template<typename Point>
00190 class BinaryShortSearch
00191 {
00192   typedef typename std::vector<Point>::size_type size_type;
00193   typedef typename std::vector<Point>::iterator MyIt;
00194   typedef typename std::vector<MyIt>::iterator MyPIt;
00195 public:
00196   std::vector<MyIt> samples;
00197   zorder_lt<Point> lt;
00198   
00199   BinaryShortSearch()
00200   {
00201   }
00202 
00203   void init(std::vector<Point> &points, int sample_size=128)
00204   {
00205     samples.resize(sample_size);
00206     srand48(time(0));
00207     
00208     for(int i=0;i < sample_size;++i)
00209       {
00210         size_type s = drand48() * (double) points.size();
00211         samples[i] = points.begin() + s;
00212       }
00213     sort(samples.begin(), samples.end(), lt);
00214   }
00215 
00216   unsigned long int BinSearch(std::vector<Point> &A, Point &q, zorder_lt<Point> LT)
00217   {
00218     MyPIt U = upper_bound(samples.begin(), samples.end(), q, LT);
00219 
00220     MyIt LI, UI;
00221     if(U == samples.begin()) LI = A.begin();
00222     else LI = *(U-1); 
00223     if(U == samples.end()) UI = A.end();
00224     else UI = *U;
00225 
00226     MyIt I = upper_bound(LI, UI, q, LT);
00227     return  I-A.begin();
00228   }
00229 };
